chapter.title: Search Paths 2
chapter.para: When you click on a folder or a folder name and thereby select it, you will see that the "path" leading to the folder in the search panel. Here the path leads from the base folder, "resources", to the folder "commons" and then to the folder "Cluster Publications", each step separated by slashes.
The folder called "commons" is used for all resources that are not particular to specific users or groups, but are meant to be general Cluster resources.

Clicking on a folder in this way is how you determine where to perform a search. If you search for something, it will be searched for inside the path you have chosen. Selecting a folder in this way performs a search also in the folders inside the selected folder, and so on.
Note that, at the present time, you can only search in one folder (and its subfolders) at a time - it is not possible to select multiple folders yet.
